name: My Pet Avocado
description:
"My Pet Avocado" Is a Virtual Pet Simulation game where you take care of a cute plant girl named Kathy, you have to feed her, take her out to grab some sunlight, provide her with water and clean her. 

You can talk with her and listen to her jokes, fun facts, and her feelings!

Point and click wherever you want Kathy to move and look at her interactions with her surroundings!

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys : Directional Pad

J/Z : B Button

K/X : A Button

Shift: Select

Enter: Start

At the start of the game there is a visual guide telling the in-game actions each button do.
